[[inst_c_bstart_mpar]]
==== C.BSTART.MPAR

*Syntax:* C.BSTART.MPAR FALL

*Description:* Block Start for Memory-PARallel: marks entry point for memory-parallel block.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_c_bstart_mpar.svg[C.BSTART.MPAR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* BBD/BSTART
